plot: Richard tests the new Vauxhall Monaro VXR. James attempts to recreate the Top Gear theme song by using the engine noises from various cars. Jeremy tests the Ford F-150 SVT Lightning pick-up truck. Richard travels to Spain to test the Lamborghini Murciélago Roadster. Timothy Spall is the Star In A Reasonably Priced Car.—Caboose

Richard is taught how to drift a Vauxhall Monaro VX-R by D1 Grand Prix driver Yasuyuki Kazama. James tries to recreate the Top Gear theme using a variety of car engine noises. Jeremy examines the Ford F150 SVT Lightning. Timothy Spall is the Star In A Reasonably Priced Car.—Allister Coots
